nodes.bodyText: The delete api seems a bit dangerous. Should we protect it to only allow deleting certain paths? Seems this api will allow deleting the entire cluster?
Will this allow any arbitrary path to be set with any arbitrary value (as-in possibly corrupt the cluster state)?
